summary: Members of Congress have been concerned that DOD's weapons acquisition process is too bureaucratic and slow to deliver innovations to the field. (DOD acquisitions are on our High Risk List .) Recent legislation included reforms to try to speed up the process. title: DOD Acquisition Reform: Leadership Attention Needed to Effectively Implement Changes to Acquisition Oversight
